event.title: Onboarding new contributors & investing in new maintainers: Option 3
event.metaTitle: Onboarding new contributors & investing in new maintainers
event.metaDesc: Open Source Workshops for Maintainers series
event.content:
In this 90-minute interactive workshop, maintainers will share their experiences and learn about frameworks around the contributor life-cycle. Weâ€™ll document and share best practices to help other maintainers onboard new contributors and invest in new maintainers.

Workshop registration is available in the private Maintainer Community. Request an invitation here: [maintainers.github.com](https://maintainers.github.com)

If you're part of the private Maintainer Community, you can [register here](https://github.com/community/maintainers/discussions/308).
